title: Summoner Name Change
body:
Hey can someone help me think of a new name? I dont really like this anymore just not a fanboy anymore :3 I was thinking of like Alan Shore or Denny Crane but only if you watch Boston Legal its cool especially DennyCrane.

CheersBigEars, Me

replies.body:
Oh?

You think you have problems?

Every time you make a mistake team be like "your name suites you".

Aaaaaaand mute.
**i have the best name in oce so smd**
Think of something creative c: Why not? Or maybe something funny.  Try merging words together.
That's how i got "Area2609", Didn't work out for the best :D

Think of a really dumb word or funny sounding normal name(like Frank or larry) and put Princess at the front. For example:
Princes Frank
Princes Uterus
